summary: Calculator app with automatic calculation display. User wants division results to show full decimal precision (e.g., 10 รท 3 = 3.3333333333) instead of truncated values (e.g., 3.33).
known_issues: Division results are being truncated (e.g., 10 รท 3 shows 3.33 instead of 3.3333333333)

existing_features.title: When a division operation produces a non-terminating or long decimal result (e.g., 10 รท 3), display the full precision result up to 10 decimal places (e.g., 3.3333333333) instead of truncating to 2 decimal places.

new_feature_requests.summary: Division results should show full decimal precision (e.g., 10 รท 3 = 3.3333333333) instead of truncating to fewer decimal places

projectName: Show full decimal precision for division results
